fields.headline: All male Perrier shortlist announced
fields.bodyText: This year's Perrier Comedy Award shortlist was announced earlier today. Candidates for the £7,500 prize are (in alphabetical order) Flight of the Conchords, two-time nominee Adam Hills, Reginald D. Hunter, Demetri Martin, and Howard Read & Little Howard. The best newcomer award is also an all-male affair. Alex Horne, Miles Jupp, Gary Le Strange, and Michael McIntyre will compete for this honour, won in previous years by The Consultants, Arj Barker and Harry Hill. The winners will be announced at midnight on Saturday 23 August. This year's awards will be presented by 1997 Perrier Award winners The League of Gentlemen - Mark Gatiss, Reece Shearsmith and writer and director Jeremy Dyson.
